name: HEALER
description:
I worked on this project along with 5 other team members in this university module titled IS211 Interaction Design and Prototyping. We were tasked to identify a problem and propose a solution for it.


Healer is a mental wellness mobile application targeted at providing young adults in Singapore with a safe and private space for confiding about issues, learning how to process their emotions and seeking professional help. 


As this is my first Design Thinking Project, I'd appreciate any kind of feedback that you have! Feel free to head over to my medium article to read up on how this project was conceptualised and carried out.
